rows.label: tev035201_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev035201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Inisae about humans.

rows.label: tev035201_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev035201_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Inisae if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0001
rows.name:
I was wondering how your species feels about us
Ma-non?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0002
rows.name:
I hear that some Ma-non have had unpleasant
encounters with humans in the commercial district,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0003
rows.name:
Personally, I just want to be friends with as many
humans as I can, right? But I'm a little bit scared of
your kind, to be honest...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0004
rows.name:
I know, I'm probably being silly, aren't I? I mean,
I'll never get along with you if I don't don't try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0005
rows.name:
After all, you are proof that humans can be friendly,
aren't you? So maybe if I talk to the problem humans,
we might come to a mutual understanding?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0008
rows.name:
Well, my job is to go out there and gather materials
for the others, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0009
rows.name:
But it's very very difficult to do this job without being
discovered by indigens, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0010
rows.name:
I know I could ask BLADE to do the gathering,
but I feel it's important to to explore Mira for myself...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG0011
rows.name:
I suppose I may end up getting badly hurt one day,
but those are just the risks, aren't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Inisae about humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Inisae if anything is troubling her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Inisae about the Ganglion's weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Inisae what she did during the attack.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Inisae about the Wrothians.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1061
rows.name: Ask Inisae about Sarona.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1071
rows.name: Ask Inisae about the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL1081
rows.name: Ask Inisae what she plans to do next.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1001
rows.name: Sarona told me the the most wonderful thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1002
rows.name:
Apparently Mr. Chausson and Mr. Nagi believe in a
diplomacy-first approach when dealing with xenoforms.
Did you know this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1003
rows.name:
So whenever possible, they want to establish friendship
treaties with new civilizations, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1004
rows.name:
How different your leadership is from those bullies in
the Ganglion who tried to use violence to to assimilate
us into the the the Samaar Federation![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1005
rows.name:
Who knew that humans were so wonderful?
I can't wait to make friends from all sorts of planets,
you know? It's so so so very exciting![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1010
rows.name:
Do you know a Ma-non named Sostenasa from
the hangar?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1011
rows.name:
He has a gift for mechanical repairs even by Ma-non
standardsâ€”but from the sound of it, I guess he hasn't
taken kindly to humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1012
rows.name:
I wish I could convince him otherwise, you know?
I mean, just look at Sarona and me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1013
rows.name:
She used to be scared of the Ma-non, but once we
got to know each other, everything was fine,
wasn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1014
rows.name:
If you find the time, maybe try talking to Sostenasa?
Perhaps he will tell you why he has such a low opinion
of humans.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1020
rows.name:
I agree with Sarona, you know? The Ganglion's
weapons seem to violate every aesthetic standard you
humans possess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1021
rows.name: Perhaps they chose those designs on purpose?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1022
rows.name:
It could be they were hoping their grotesque, offensive
weapons would strike fear in your hearts and rob you
of your will to fight, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1023
rows.name:
The more I think about them, the more I realize how
sickening and and and despicable an organization the
Ganglion truly are, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1030
rows.name: ...Me? Er, I took refuge on our ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1031
rows.name:
But I had a feeling I would walk the streets of New LA
again, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1032
rows.name:
...Why? Because you were out there fighting for us,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1033
rows.name: And and sure enough, here I am![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1034
rows.name:
As long as we have you, New LA and the Ma-non will
always be safe, won't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1040
rows.name:
Oh, you mean the xenoforms who stole that important
Skell from the restricted hangar, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1041
rows.name:
Did you hear about it? They engaged the BLADEs who
were guarding the place, I guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1042
rows.name:
Strangely, though, the BLADEs escaped without any
serious injury. Which is weird, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1043
rows.name:
What do you make of that? Could it be that the
Wrothians don't wish humans any harm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1044
rows.name:
Sarona might be right about them. She thinks you
could befriend the Wrothians just as you did the
Ma-non, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1050
rows.name: What am I going to do with Sarona?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1051
rows.name:
The Wrothians speak the same language, but she's
treating them like... Well, like what they look like,
you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1052
rows.name:
Say, I have an idea. You humans evolved from 
gluttonutan-like creatures, did you not?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1053
rows.name:
Next time Sarona treats the Wrothians like pets,
perhaps I'll offer her a bananaleaf?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1054
rows.name:
That should get the message across loud and clear!
Er, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1060
rows.name:
I hear BLADE will be heading for the Lifehold Core
soon, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1061
rows.name:
Be careful out there, okay? It would be a shame if
anyone died before they got their real bodies back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1062
rows.name:
But as long as you're there fighting with them,
[ST:playername ], I know the mission will be
a a huge success. You can do it, right?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1068
rows.name: Actually, I've decided to explore Mira with Sarona.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1069
rows.name:
You know a lot about indigen salvage, right,
[ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1070
rows.name:
You'll have to tell me which materials make for the
most delicious recipes, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG1071
rows.name:
I want to try making rare indigen foods now that I've
had cinicula chocolate, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL2011
rows.name: Ask Inisae about recent developments.

rows.label: tev035201_MSG2001
rows.name:
I guess that Sostenasa the repair worker has finally
started to warm a little toward humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG2002
rows.name: I assume you had had a hand in that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG2003
rows.name:
I know what it's like to be eyed with fear and suspicion
at first, so I'm really glad that Sostenasa finally came
around, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG2004
rows.name:
Thank you, [ST:playername ].
You did a really wonderful thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_SEL3011
rows.name: Ask Inisae about recent developments.

rows.label: tev035201_MSG3001
rows.name:
It sounds like Sostenasa still hasn't revised his negative
opinion of humans?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG3002
rows.name:
But he did say he would continue to accept
requests from you, yes, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG3003
rows.name:
That's a good sign, right? Or at least it means he's still
willing to be convinced?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG3004
rows.name:
Sarona got used to me, so let's just hope Sostenasa
can learn to do the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035201_MSG3005
rows.name:
If he can learn to tolerate humans, then maybe
becoming friends with you is just a matter of time?[ST:wait ]
